name: Juan Carlos Villasenor
coverLetter: I am looking for a full time 8 hr+ shift, I live in Phoenix,OR and I have reliable transportation so I am able to commute to any location here in the Rogue valley in a timely manner. I have hard work ethic, I am a quick learner and am able to adapt to any changes. I have trimmed for only a few days, so I have very little experience but I am eager to learn more about the cannabis industry and I think this would be a great opportunity to do so. I look forward to hear from you. Thank you.
